title: Speaking Your Language:  Writing a MarkLogic Application Using Your Favorite Programming Language
abstract: Programmers who haven't learned XQuery yet shouldn't have to miss out on the MarkLogic party. For an upcoming release of MarkLogic, we're exploring two options to open up the tent: first, a RESTful API for document CRUD and search so any language with an HTTP client can use MarkLogic; second, an even simpler language-specific API for some languages like Java. Work with your documents in the language you already know.
